title: lane call
body: whats with people not calling there lanes at the start of the game where you call supp and no calls it but when you start the game they say the said supp so you end up with 2 supp and loose the game big time {{champion:53}}

replies.body:
unfortunately there is nothing you can do about this aside from try to work out how to play supports in other roles like blitzcrank top or zilean mid. But generally try to pay attention to which champions people have selected and their summoners. 
The sup usually has exhaust, the adc will be a marksman with heal, the top will usually have tp, the mid will clearly state they are mid constantly in chat so just ask who is mid and get a stream of copypasta in response 'mid or afk' and the jungler sometimes has smite and sometimes argues that ignite and ghost is better for jungling and you want to strangle them but you gotta accept your elo.

Sometimes people join late and you may have missed the call. That doesn't excuse the 4 other people in the lobby not saying a thing to you or the other person who picked support to let them know they need to change. It's not asking for much you're all on the same team why not work together?
